{C1}―{End}
{C1}A legend, passed down through generations... A land in turmoil... Two heroes will clash, but only one will prevail...{End}
{C1}The tale of how a young Nobunaga, dismissed as a mere fool, came to become the mightiest Warrior in all of Ransei.{End}
{C1}Hideyoshi has great dreams for the future. Luckily for him, he has the two visionaries Hanbei and Kanbei at his side...{End}
{C1}With high hopes placed on him by his faithful allies, Ieyasu sets out to collect as many Pokémon as he can...{End}
{C1}Yukimura has been appointed Warlord in Shingen's stead. Can he live up to the pressure and do his lord proud...?{End}
{C1}The tale of two rivals, among the greatest Warriors in all of Ransei, and the one person who anticipated their showdown more eagerly than any other...{End}
{C1}Ginchiyo, famous for hating defeat like no other, has a chance to be crowned Ransei's Greatest Beauty...{End}
{C1}The time has come when Mitsuhide can no longer condone his master Nobunaga's aggressive policy of waging endless battles. It is time to make a stand...{End}
{C1}Kotarō takes on the challenge of proving himself the greatest ninja, plunging Ransei into profound darkness in the process...{End}
{C1}The tale of three good friends who became embroiled in a trivial argument. Who could have known where it would lead...?{End}
{C1}The story of three ninjas who bickered over their role in Ransei, and what Nene decided to do about it... {End}
{C1}“It's time to show me what you're capable of!” Commanded by his lord Hideyoshi, Hanbei reluctantly takes to the field of battle...{End}
{C1}Tadakatsu is renowned as the mightiest Warrior in Ransei. Now is his chance to prove his mettle as a Warlord as well...{End}
{C1}From the shadows, Hanzō creeps forth. He wishes to show his rivals the true nature of a ninja's work... {End}
{C1}Two archenemies, each with great respect for the other, meet on the field of battle. The earth will shake as they seek to find a victor...{End}
{C1}“I don't really know why we're doing this, but hey, it looks kinda fun!” The story of how Kunoichi became embroiled in a ninja battle. {End}
{C1}This is Kanetsugu's chance―he must prove to his lord Kenshin that he can spread love and righteousness all across the land.{End}
{C1}Female Warlords rule the roost in Ransei... But Aya wishes to spread her teachings of love...{End}
{C1}With retirement approaching, most men would take things easy. But the battle-loving veteran Yoshihiro―he sets off on one last gamble...{End}
{C1}“I shan't forgive any kind of defeat, you understand!” Ginchiyo entrusts her castle to Muneshige, but will she live to regret her choice...?{End}
{C1}Ransei is controlled by women Warlords, but who is the fairest and the strongest of them all? Nō has no doubts in her mind...{End}
{C1}Although her father is concerned, Gracia is delighted at the opportunity to set out on her own. It is time for this little girl to grow up!{End}
{C1}Nobunaga rolls across Ransei like a mighty black wave... Motochika must resist―but how...?{End}
{C1}One must fight to protect what one holds dear... This philosophy guides Ujiyasu as he sets out to take on two of Ransei's most fearsome Warriors...{End}
{C1}The tale of three good friends who became embroiled in a trivial argument. Who could have known where it would lead...?{End}
{C1}Spurred on by her friends and followers, Oichi enters a contest to decide the rightful owner of the title Ransei's Greatest Beauty...{End}
{C1}Hideyoshi's sudden disappearance leaves Kanbei in charge of the kingdom. He sets out on a quest to collect Pokémon, but... {End}
{C1}Determined not to damage her father's reputation, Ina enters the conflict raging over the much-desired title of Ransei's Greatest Beauty...{End}
{C1}The story of Yoshimoto's greatest invention, the ball game Pokémari, and his struggle to spread the joy he finds in it across Ransei.{End}
